dpgcd_rankings.methodology: Raw DPGCD = AP * apCoefficient * (1 + delta/2) / GCD_duration. GCD_duration = 1.5s / (1 + haste). At 20% haste, GCD = 1.25s. For multi-hit abilities, total coefficient is summed. Fragment-scaling abilities multiply base by fragment count. All delta values are 0.05 where present.

dpgcd_per_gcd_investment.note: SBomb at 5 frags costs 1 GCD for 4.0 coeff. Producing 5 frags costs ~2.5 Fracture GCDs. Total DPGCD of SBomb+builders cycle: (4.0 + 2.5*3.105) / 3.5 = 3.36 coeff/GCD. At 3 frags: (3.2 + 1.5*3.105) / 2.5 = 3.148 coeff/GCD.
dpgcd_per_gcd_investment.implication: The per-GCD-investment gap between 3-frag and 5-frag SBomb is only 6.3%. Under FD (+30%), the 3-frag SBomb fires sooner, adding more casts under the window.

theories.title: Anni FD-aware SBomb threshold at 3 frags
theories.reasoning: The AR APL has spirit_bomb,if=soul_fragments>=3&variable.fiery_demise_active (line 61), lowering the threshold during FD windows to squeeze more SBomb casts into the 10s window. The Anni APL lacks this. Under FD, SBomb at 3 frags yields 4.16 coeff per cast. The extra cast during a 10s FD window adds ~4.49 effective coeff (with BB). Over 5 FD windows in 5 min: ~22.5 coeff gain = ~0.5-0.75% DPS for FD Anni builds. Must guard with !buff.voidfall_spending.up to avoid premature meteor consumption.
evidence: Anni main list has no equivalent FD-aware SBomb line
SBomb 3-frag under FD: 4.16 coeff vs 5-frag: 5.20 coeff per cast
FD window is 10s = 8 GCDs, enough for 2 SBomb cycles at 3-frag threshold

theories.title: Non-VB Anni builds should relax Meta hold condition
theories.reasoning: Current APL holds Meta when building>=2 to enable double Voidfall burst via Mass Acceleration. Without Vengeful Beast, Meta is 15s (12 GCDs). Double burst needs 12 GCDs minimum with zero margin. Hold cost = ~12.8s of un-amplified Fractures = 38.4 lost coeff at 1.20x. Double burst meteor gain = 27.6 coeff. Net loss of ~10.8 coeff per hold. VB builds get 20s (16 GCDs) with 4 spare GCDs, making double burst comfortable.
evidence: GCD budget: 12/12 without VB, 12/16 with VB
Hold cost: ~8.57 Fractures * 1.5s avg * 3.105 coeff * 0.20 amp = 38.4 lost coeff
Double burst gain: 18.9 * 1.08 * 1.35 = 27.6 extra meteor coeff

theories.title: Spirit Bomb dominates DPGCD at all target counts due to deepest modifier stack
theories.reasoning: Spirit Bomb benefits from 8 simultaneous multiplicative modifiers: BB, FD, Frailty, Vulnerability, Soulcrush, Meta, VB, and either RM/TotF (AR) or OWF (Anni). At 5 frags with full buffs, compound multiplier reaches 3.12x (AR) or 2.38x (Anni). No other ability matches this depth. This confirms SBomb priority is correct and no reordering is viable.
evidence: Next best: Fracture Anni Meta CE: 9.15 coeff (but builder, not spender)

theories.title: Fracture is highest-value builder due to 2pc + Celestial Echoes triple-stacking
theories.reasoning: Fracture benefits from 12.0 2pc (+35%), Tempered Steel (+12%), and Celestial Echoes passive (+30%) + buff (+25%) in Anni. Always-on multiplier: 1.35*1.12 = 1.512. With CE in Anni: 1.512*1.30*1.25 = 2.457. Base 3.105 * 2.457 = 7.63 DPGCD. Exceeds SBomb 5-frag raw (4.0) before any burst windows. Secondary value (25-40 Fury + 2-3 frags) compounds this further.
evidence: 2pc: +35%, Tempered Steel: +12%, CE passive: +30%, CE buff: +25%
Also generates 25 Fury + 2 frags (40+3 in Meta)

theories.title: FelDev without Stoke the Flames is below Fracture DPGCD
theories.reasoning: FelDev base DPGCD = 1.284 (2.055 total / 1.6 effective GCD). Fracture = 3.83 with 2pc+TS. FelDev without Stoke is 33.5% of Fracture DPGCD. Even with BB (+8%), FelDev reaches 1.387. FelDev value comes from: (1) FD synergy, (2) MR fragment gen in Anni, (3) Final Breath bonus. Without Stoke, FelDev is a net DPS loss per GCD vs Fracture.

theories.title: Soul Carver AoE crossover at ~4.3 targets vs Immolation Aura
theories.reasoning: Soul Carver is ST-only (5.10 total coeff). IA scales linearly with targets (1.069*N total). With BB+FD: SC=7.16, IA/target=1.654. Crossover at 7.16/1.654 = 4.33 targets. At 5+, IA definitively superior. SC fragment gen (6 frags) provides value beyond damage in brand windows. Current APL correctly handles this via ar_brand_window ordering.
evidence: IA: 1.654 coeff per target with BB+AF+FD
